briefTitle: Observational Usage Study of Faslodex in Patients Suffering From Initial Breast Cancer in France
officialTitle: Observational Usage Study of Faslodex in Patients Suffering From Initial Breast Cancer in France
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluate Faslodex therapeutic strategy and treatment duration
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients suffering from initial breast cancer, treated with Faslodex, treatment which was stopped during 2007
